stache_copyright_label._description: Text to accompany the copyright date in the footer

stache_sidebar_toggle_button._description: Button text to show or hide sidebar menu

stache_back_to_top_button.message: Scroll back to the top of the page
stache_back_to_top_button._description: Button title for back to top button

skyux_numeric_billions_symbol._description: Symbol to be used when abbreviating a "billion" number.

skyux_numeric_millions_symbol._description: Symbol to be used when abbreviating a "million" number.

skyux_numeric_thousands_symbol._description: Symbol to be used when abbreviating a "thousand" number.

skyux_numeric_trillions_symbol._description: Symbol to be used when abbreviating a "trillion" number.

skyux_flyout_iterator_previous_button._description: Label for the previous iterator button

skyux_flyout_iterator_next_button._description: Label for the next iterator button

skyux_flyout_permalink_button._description: Default text for the flyout permalink button

skyux_flyout_primary_action_button._description: Default text for the flyout primary action button

skyux_flyout_resize_handle._description: Label for the flyout resizing handle
skyux_flyout_resize_handle.message: Resize the flyout window. Use left arrow key to expand the flyout window and right arrow key to shrink the flyout window.

skyux_character_count_message._description: Screen reader only label for character count

skyux_character_count_over_limit._description: Screen reader only label for character count over limit symbol
skyux_character_count_over_limit.message: You are over the character limit.

skyux_file_attachment_button_label_choos._description: Button label for single file attachment when input has no value

skyux_file_attachment_button_label_repla._description: Button label for single file attachment when file has been chosen

skyux_file_attachment_file_item_delete._description: Label for the button that deletes a file

skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_drag_o.message: Drag a file here or click to browse

skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_link_i._description: Label for input to upload file
skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_link_i.message: Add a link to a file

skyux_file_attachment_file_upload_paste_.message: Paste a link to a file

skyux_file_attachment_label_no_file_chos._description: Label for single file attachment when no file is chosen

skyux_alert_close._description: Screen reader text for the close button on alerts

skyux_chevron_collapse._description: Screen reader text for when clicking the chevron would collapse the corresponding section

skyux_chevron_expand._description: Screen reader text for when clicking the chevron would expand the corresponding section

skyux_help_inline_button_title._description: The title for the help button.

skyux_tokens_dismiss_button_title._description: The default text for the token dismiss button title.

skyux_wait_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a non-blocking section wait component.

skyux_wait_blocking_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a blocking section wait component.

skyux_wait_page_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a non-blocking page wait component.

skyux_wait_page_blocking_aria_alt_text._description: The default alt text for a blocking page wait component.

skyux_card_checkbox_label._description: Label for the multiselect checkbox for the card component

skyux_definition_list_none_found._description: The default text to show when a definition list item has no value

skyux_inline_delete_assistive_text._description: Accessibility description for the inline delete component
skyux_inline_delete_assistive_text.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

skyux_inline_delete_cancel._description: Label for the inline delete's cancel button

skyux_inline_delete_confirm_deletion._description: Accessibility label for the inline delete component

skyux_inline_delete_delete._description: Label for the inline delete's delete button

skyux_text_expand_close_text._description: Text for the close button on the text expand modal

skyux_filter_button_title._description: Text for the filter button title

skyux_filter_summary_close._description: Text for the filter summary component's close button

skyux_filter_summary_header._description: Text for the filter summary component

skyux_infinite_scroll_load_more_button._description: Text for loading more in the infinite scroll button

skyux_paging_label._description: Default text for the label for the pagination component

skyux_paging_next._description: Text for the label for the next button on the pagination component

skyux_paging_previous._description: Text for the label for the previous button on the pagination component

skyux_repeater_item_checkbox_label._description: Label for the repeater item checkbox for the repeater component

skyux_repeater_item_reorder_cancel._description: Accessible screen reader text for when a reorder is finished
skyux_repeater_item_reorder_cancel.message: Item reordering was canceled. The item was returned to its original position.

skyux_repeater_item_reorder_finish._description: Accessible screen reader text for when a reorder is finished

skyux_repeater_item_reorder_instructions._description: Accessible operation instructions for reordering a repeater item
skyux_repeater_item_reorder_instructions.message: Item grabbed. Press the up and down arrow keys to change position. Press the spacebar or enter key to drop. And press the escape key to cancel.

skyux_repeater_item_reorder_moved._description: Alerts the user to the new position an items moved to. Does not include variable due to usage case

skyux_repeater_item_reorder_operation._description: Accessible operation instructions for triggering reordering a repeater item
skyux_repeater_item_reorder_operation.message: Press the spacebar or enter key to reorder.

skyux_repeater_item_reorder_top._description: Accessible label for button to reorder a repeater item to the top of the list

skyux_sort_menu_heading._description: Text for the heading in the sort dropdown

skyux_search_placeholder._description: Placeholder text for search input component

skyux_autocomplete_no_results._description: Placeholder text for autocomplete input component when no results are found

skyux_confirm_dialog_default_ok_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's OK button

skyux_confirm_dialog_default_yes_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's Yes button

skyux_confirm_dialog_default_no_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's No button

skyux_confirm_dialog_default_cancel_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's Cancel button

skyux_modal_open_help._description: Text for modal header Open Help button

skyux_modal_footer_cancel_button._description: Default label text for modal cancel button

skyux_modal_footer_primary_button._description: Default label text for modal primary button

skyux_dropdown_context_menu_default_labe._description: The label on the context menu button used for screen readers when the consumer has not specified a label
